original_text: There is none like you, O Lord, and there is no God besides you, according to all that we have heard with our ears.
korean_text: 여호와여 우리 귀로 들은 대로는 주와 같은 이가 없고 주 외에는 하나님이 없나이다

sentences.original_text: There is none like you, O Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 주와 같은 이는 없습니다, 오 주여

sentences.original_text: and there is no God besides you
according to all that we have heard with our ears.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 귀로 들은 모든 것에 따르면
